verses.verse: Now Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> was a valiant <S%H2428><s%> warrior, <S%H1368><s%> but he was the son <S%H1121><s%> of a harlot. <S%H802><s%> <S%H2181><s%> And Gilead <S%H1568><s%> was the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jephthah. <S%H3316><s%>

And Gilead's wife <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> him sons; <S%H1121><s%> and when his wife's sons <S%H1121><s%> grew <S%H1431><s%> up, they drove <S%H1644><s%> Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> out and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "You shall not have <S%H5157><s%> an inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in our father's house, <S%H1004><s%> for you are the son <S%H1121><s%> of another <S%H312><s%> woman. <S%H802><s%>"

So Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> from his brothers <S%H251><s%> and lived <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Tob; <S%H2897><s%> and worthless <S%H7386><s%> fellows <S%H376><s%> gathered <S%H3950><s%> themselves about <S%H413><s%> Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> and they went <S%H3318><s%> out with him.
And it came <S%H1961><s%> about after <S%H4480><s%> a while <S%H3117><s%> that the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And it happened <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H9201><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> fought <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> that the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to get <S%H3947><s%> Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Tob; <S%H2897><s%>
and they said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "Come <S%H1980><s%> and be our chief <S%H7101><s%> that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> against the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>"

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> "Did you not hate <S%H8130><s%> me and drive <S%H1644><s%> me from my father's house <S%H1004><s%>? So why <S%H4069><s%> have you come <S%H935><s%> to me now <S%H6258><s%> when <S%H9201><s%> you are in trouble <S%H9503><s%>?"

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "For this <S%H3651><s%> reason <S%H3651><s%> we have now <S%H6258><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> to you, that you may go <S%H1980><s%> with us and fight <S%H3898><s%> with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> and become <S%H1961><s%> head <S%H7218><s%> over all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gilead. <S%H1568><s%>"

So Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> you take <S%H7725><s%> me back <S%H7725><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> them up to me, will I become <S%H1961><s%> your head <S%H7218><s%>?"

And the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is witness <S%H8085><s%> between <S%H996><s%> us; surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> we will do <S%H6213><s%> as you have said. <S%H1697><s%>"

Then Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> with the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> made <S%H7760><s%> him head <S%H7218><s%> and chief <S%H7101><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them; and Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his words <S%H1697><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> at Mizpah. <S%H4709><s%>

Now Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> is between you and me, that you have come <S%H935><s%> to me to fight <S%H3898><s%> against my land <S%H776><s%>?"

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the messengers <S%H4397><s%> of Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> "Because <S%H3588><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> away my land <S%H776><s%> when they came <S%H5927><s%> up from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the Arnon <S%H769><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the Jabbok <S%H2999><s%> and the Jordan; <S%H3383><s%> therefore, return <S%H7725><s%> them peaceably <S%H7965><s%> now. <S%H6258><s%>"
But Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%>

and they said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> 'Israel <S%H3478><s%> did not take <S%H3947><s%> away the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

'For when they came <S%H5927><s%> up from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> through the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea <S%H3220><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to Kadesh, <S%H6946><s%>

then Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom, <S%H9000><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Please <S%H4994><s%> let us pass <S%H5674><s%> through your land, <S%H776><s%>" but the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom <S%H9000><s%> would not listen. <S%H8085><s%> And they also <S%H1571><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> but he would not consent. <S%H14><s%> So Israel <S%H3478><s%> remained <S%H3427><s%> at Kadesh. <S%H6946><s%>

'Then they went <S%H1980><s%> through the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> and around <S%H5437><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H9000><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to the east <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> side <S%H4217><s%> <S%H8121><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> and they camped <S%H2583><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Arnon; <S%H769><s%> but they did not enter <S%H935><s%> the territory <S%H1366><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> for the Arnon <S%H769><s%> [was] the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

'And Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, "Please <S%H4994><s%> let us pass <S%H5674><s%> through your land <S%H776><s%> to our place. <S%H4725><s%>"

'But Sihon <S%H5511><s%> did not trust <S%H539><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> through his territory; <S%H1366><s%> so Sihon <S%H5511><s%> gathered <S%H622><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> and camped <S%H2583><s%> in Jahaz, <S%H3096><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

'And the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and they defeated <S%H5221><s%> them; so Israel <S%H3478><s%> possessed <S%H3423><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of that country. <S%H776><s%>

'So they possessed <S%H3423><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the territory <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> from the Arnon <S%H769><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> and from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

'Since now <S%H6258><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> drove <S%H3423><s%> out the Amorites <S%H567><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> His people <S%H5971><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> are you then to possess <S%H3423><s%> it?

'Do you not possess <S%H3423><s%> what <S%H834><s%> Chemosh <S%H3645><s%> your god <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H3423><s%> you to possess <S%H3423><s%>? So whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> has driven <S%H3423><s%> out before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> us, we will possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

'And now <S%H6258><s%> are you any <S%H2895><s%> better <S%H2896><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> Balak <S%H1111><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zippor, <S%H6834><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>? Did he ever <S%H7378><s%> strive <S%H7378><s%> with Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or <S%H518><s%> did he ever <S%H3898><s%> fight <S%H3898><s%> against them?

'While Israel <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> and its villages, <S%H1323><s%> and in Aroer <S%H6177><s%> and its villages, <S%H1323><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are on the banks <S%H3027><s%> of the Arnon, <S%H769><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> why <S%H4069><s%> did you not recover <S%H5337><s%> them within that time <S%H6256><s%>?

'I therefore have not sinned <S%H2398><s%> against you, but you are doing <S%H6213><s%> me wrong <S%H9567><s%> by making <S%H3898><s%> war <S%H3898><s%> against me; may the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the Judge, <S%H8199><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%> today <S%H3117><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>' "

But the king <S%H4428><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> disregarded <S%H3808><s%> <S%H8085><s%> the message <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> him.

Now the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> upon Jephthah, <S%H3316><s%> so that he passed <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> then he passed <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> Mizpah <S%H4708><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and from Mizpah <S%H4708><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> he went <S%H5674><s%> on to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon. <S%H5983><s%>

And Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> made <S%H5087><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "If <S%H518><s%> Thou wilt indeed <S%H5414><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> into my hand, <S%H3027><s%>

then it shall be that whatever <S%H834><s%> comes <S%H3318><s%> out of the doors <S%H1817><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> to meet <S%H7122><s%> me when I return <S%H7725><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> it shall be the Lord's, and I will offer <S%H5927><s%> it up as a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering. <S%H5930><s%> "

So Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> crossed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against them; and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> them into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And he struck <S%H5221><s%> them with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter <S%H4347><s%> from Aroer <S%H6177><s%> to the entrance <S%H935><s%> of Minnith, <S%H4511><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and as far <S%H5704><s%> as Abel-keramim. So the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> were subdued <S%H3665><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

When Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to his house <S%H1004><s%> at Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> was coming <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7122><s%> him with tambourines <S%H8596><s%> and with dancing. <S%H4246><s%> Now she was his one <S%H3173><s%> [and] only <S%H7534><s%> child; <S%H3173><s%> besides <S%H4480><s%> her he had <S%H369><s%> neither <S%H369><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> nor <S%H176><s%> daughter. <S%H1323><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when he saw <S%H7200><s%> her, that he tore <S%H7167><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Alas, <S%H162><s%> my daughter! <S%H1323><s%> You have brought <S%H3766><s%> me very <S%H3766><s%> low, <S%H3766><s%> and you are among those who trouble <S%H5916><s%> me; for I have given <S%H6475><s%> my word <S%H6310><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and I cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> take <S%H7725><s%> [it] back. <S%H7725><s%>"

So she said <S%H559><s%> to him, "My father, you have given <S%H1><s%> your word <S%H6475><s%> to the Lord; <S%H6310><s%> do <S%H3068><s%> to me as you have said <S%H6213><s%>, <S%H3318><s%> <S%H4480><s%> since <S%H6310><s%> <S%H310><s%> the Lord <S%H834><s%> has avenged <S%H3068><s%> you of your enemies, <S%H5360><s%> the sons <S%H340><s%> of Ammon. <S%H1121><s%>"

And she said <S%H559><s%> to her father, "Let this <S%H1><s%> thing <S%H2088><s%> be done <S%H1697><s%> for me; let <S%H6213><s%> me alone <S%H7503><s%> <S%H4480><s%> two <S%H7503><s%> months, <S%H8147><s%> that I may go <S%H2320><s%> <S%H1980><s%> to the mountains <S%H3381><s%> and weep <S%H2022><s%> because <S%H1058><s%> of my virginity, <S%H5921><s%> I and my companions. <S%H1331><s%>"

Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "Go. <S%H1980><s%>" So he sent <S%H7971><s%> her away <S%H7971><s%> for two <S%H8147><s%> months; <S%H2320><s%> and she left <S%H1980><s%> with her companions, <S%H7464><s%> and wept <S%H1058><s%> on the mountains <S%H2022><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> of her virginity. <S%H1331><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about at the end <S%H7093><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> that she returned <S%H7725><s%> to her father, who did <S%H1><s%> to her according to the vow <S%H6213><s%> which <S%H5088><s%> he had made; <S%H834><s%> and she had <S%H5087><s%> no <S%H3045><s%> relations <S%H3808><s%> with a man. <S%H3045><s%> Thus it became <S%H376><s%> a custom <S%H1961><s%> in Israel, <S%H2706><s%>

that the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> yearly <S%H3117><s%> to commemorate <S%H8567><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Jephthah <S%H3316><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> four <S%H702><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the year. <S%H8141><s%>
